code: import React from"react";import"./Actions.css";import"./SessionInterval.css";function SessionInterval(props){function increaseCounter(){var currentInterval=props.sessionInterval;if(currentInterval>=60){return;}props.onSessionIntervalChange(props.sessionInterval+1);}function decreaseCounter(){var currentInterval=props.sessionInterval;if(currentInterval===0){return;}props.onSessionIntervalChange(currentInterval-1);}return React.createElement("section",{id:"session-interval-container"},React.createElement("h4",null,"Session Length :"),React.createElement("section",{id:"session-interval"},React.createElement("button",{disabled:props.isPlay?"disabled":"",onClick:decreaseCounter,className:"counter-btn"},"Down"),React.createElement("p",{className:"session-time"},props.sessionInterval),React.createElement("button",{disabled:props.isPlay?"disabled":"",onClick:increaseCounter,className:"counter-btn"},"Up")));}export default SessionInterval;
